All Classes and Interfaces

Classes
Class
Description
GameBoard
The GameBoard class represents the main game board for the TRON Light-Cycle Battle game.
GameBoardWithCentralCrossHurdle
The GameBoardWithCentralCrossHurdle class represents a game board for the TRON Light-Cycle Battle game that features a central cross-shaped hurdle.
GameBoardWithFourCorners
The GameBoardWithFourCorners class represents a game board for the TRON Light-Cycle Battle game that features four rectangular hurdles, each positioned in a corner of the board.
GameBoardWithHurdle
The GameBoardWithHurdle class represents a game board for the TRON Light-Cycle Battle game that includes a single rectangular hurdle placed in the center of the screen.
GameBoardWithThreeSmallCircleHurdles
The GameBoardWithThreeSmallCircleHurdles class represents a game board with three small circular hurdles positioned at different locations on the screen.
GameBoardWithThreeVerticalHurdles
The GameBoardWithThreeVerticalHurdles class represents a game board with three vertical hurdles positioned across the width of the screen.
GameBoardWithTwoHurdles
The GameBoardWithTwoHurdles class represents a game board with two large hurdles positioned at equal distances from the center of the screen.
GameBoardWithTwoParallelHurdles
The GameBoardWithTwoParallelHurdles class represents a game board with two parallel horizontal hurdles.
GameBoardWithVisibleBoundary
The GameBoardWithVisibleBoundary class represents a game board with a thick, visible red boundary around the edges of the playable area.
GameBoardWithZigZagHurdles
The GameBoardWithZigZagHurdles class represents a game board with a zigzag pattern of hurdles.
GameController
The GameController class manages the overall flow of the TRON game.
GameDrawArea
The GameDrawArea class handles the drawing of the game elements, including the motorcycles and their trails.
HighScore
The HighScore class represents a player's high score in the TRON game.
HighScores
The HighScores class manages the high score records for the TRON game.
MenuScreen
The MenuScreen class shows the main menu of the TRON game.
Motorcycle
The Motorcycle class represents a player's motorcycle in the TRON game.
PlayerSetupScreen
The PlayerSetupScreen class allows players to set up their details before starting the game.
TRON
The TRON class is the starting point of the game.
WelcomeScreen
The WelcomeScreen class shows the initial screen of the TRON game.
